Cloudera Labs

Search

Site search can be configured in your _config.yml by setting search_enabled.

search_enabled: true

Indexing Pages

For a page to be indexed, it must meet two criteria:

  1. It must produce HTML content.

    This means markdown/text/etcâ€¦ files are included while things like asset files are not.

  2. The pages front matter must include a non-empty title property.

    Example

    ---
id: my-doc
title: My Searchable Documenet
---

## My Document
Introduction Goal-oriented Guides References Operations
ECS: Client ECS: LVM ECS: GPU ECS: Add ECS Node ECS: Remove Node OCP: GPU OCP: CDW Disk CML: CSR with AutoTLS
